document.full_text: simon cowell blames attorneys for the fact that paula abdul's deal to serve as a judge on cowell's "the x factor" closed at the eleventh hour sunday -- just as the judges' rounds of auditions were about to start.
document.title: simon cowell blames lawyers for abdul delay
lines_and_colors: simon cowell blames attorneys for the fact that paula abdul's deal to serve as a judge on cowell's "the x factor" closed at the eleventh hour sunday -- just as the judges' rounds of auditions were about to start.
